task: Four anthropomorphic superheroes: one lemon slice and three distinct pill/vitamins
name: Pause Menu

branding_data.short_description:
Controls

P: Pause
Left/Right Keys: Change channel
O: Ordering
?: Buzz
branding_data.detailed_description: A square 2D digital illustration suitable as a mobile pause-menu background, featuring four anthropomorphic superheroes: one lemon slice and three distinct pill/vitamin designs (a red-and-white capsule, a blue tablet, and a yellow circular tablet), each wearing masks and capes in dynamic poses against a warm orange gradient backdrop with subtle star highlights.
